channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: These Buds Come With All the Specs but Don't Cost All the Money
item.dc:creator: Bertel King
item.description: Why pay a lot when you don't have to?
item.content:encoded: The JLab JBuds Pods ANC are affordable buds with excellent battery life and a svelte carrying case. They check off the spec wishlist, but that doesn't quite mean they're up to par with more premium buds.

item.title: Adult Swim's Disturbing Infomercials: A Surreal Nightmare
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: Setting a trap for late-night cable watchers.
item.content:encoded: Cartoon Network's "Adult Swim" programming block gave us so much groundbreaking TV, and we're still feeling the effects of it today, as creators who got their big break with Adult Swim moved on to create other iconic media.

item.title: 9 Massive Laptops That Redefine "Portability"
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: Imagine lugging around a 30-pound 'laptop' with no battery. These early portable computers were more like anchors than mobile devices, but they paved the way for today's notebooks.
item.content:encoded: Even the biggest, heaviest laptop I own—a 17-inch workstation monster— can still easily fit in a backpack with enough room left for snacks. But over the course of portable computing history, there have been some computers that really stretch the definition of "mobile".

item.title: Throwback Movie Showings Could Keep Cinemas Afloat
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: Still busting the block in my heart.
item.content:encoded: When's the last time you went to the cinema to see the latest and greatest movie releases? It's been a while for me too! Going to the cinema is just too expensive, inconvenient, and if the movie's coming to my home shortly after its theatrical run, what's the point?

item.title: The New Pebble App Works With Old Watches, and It’s Now in Beta
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.description: New App Brings Old Watches Back to Life
item.content:encoded: The Pebble smartwatch resurgence has been one of the more surprising tech developments of 2025. It started back in March when it was announced that new devices would be produced, and we're now very close to those new Pebble devices arriving. However, if you have an old Pebble, there's some good news, too.

item.title: Grab This 4-bay UGREEN NAS for 15% Off Right Now
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: This a good time to get a NAS with seriously high capacity.
item.content:encoded: The Ugreen NASync DH4300 Plus 4-Bay Desktop NAS is now on sale for just $366 on Amazon, a major 15% discount from its original price of $430. This makes it an excellent value for anyone who needs an easy-to-use home storage solution. The best part is that it offers up to 120TB capacity for all your data.

item.title: Why an iPod Touch and Dumb Phone Is My Dream Mobile Setup
item.dc:creator: Andy Betts
item.description: Two classic devices are better than a single smartphone.
item.content:encoded: It's been three years since Apple discontinued the iPod Touch and six since the company last made one. And while its demise was inevitable, part of me still hopes that it'll one day make a comeback. Sitting somewhere between an iPhone and an iPad Mini, and paired with a dumb phone, it would be my ideal mobile setup.

item.title: Windows 11 Preview Build Forces You Into More Copilot
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Hey, you haven't heard about Copilot before, right?
item.content:encoded: Windows 11 just got a new Insider Preview Build, and it’s pushing Copilot+ features even more. While this update also brings some fixes and improvements for things like the Narrator and gaming, the biggest takeaway is how much Microsoft is trying to get you to use its AI.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro vs. Google Pixel 10 Pro: Which Pro Phone Is Best?
item.dc:creator: Shikhar Mehrotra
item.description: You'll have to choose between performance and convenience.
item.content:encoded: The iPhone 17 Pro is here with a new unibody design, the A19 Pro (3nm) chip, and a better-than-ever 48MP triple camera system for added versatility. However, due to similar pricing and placement, the handset competes directly with Google's Pixel 10 Pro. So, which one is better for you? Let's find out.

item.title: How to Avoid a Buggy Windows Update
item.dc:creator: Shan Abdul
item.content:encoded: Microsoft regularly releases Windows updates to introduce new features and fix known issues. However, at times, these updates can bring along glitches, cause compatibility issues, or even slow down your system. That’s why I hold off on installing updates immediately to prevent unnecessary problems.
